release_notes.en-US:
Version 4.17.4 Maintenance Version
  • Added Alt + [Up] as possible navigation shortcut to go to parent folder.
  • Extended Alt + [Left] and Alt + [Right] shortcuts to go to the next sibling folder if no QuickFolders tab is selected. If a visible QuickFolders tab is selected, then the next tab will be activated, as before - for these features the corresponding Keyboard Shortcuts choice on the QF General Options tab has to be activated.
  • Sometimes the current folder bar shows an incorrect subfolder menu (from a previously visited folder) - fixed by forcing it to rebuild every time a different folder is visited.
  • Removed unnecessary error console warning from simplified setElementStyle() function.
Version 4.17.3 Maintenance Version
  • [issue 14] Gray area shown below email list when starting Thunderbird in wide view with Current Folder Toolbar hidden.
  • [issue 15] Current Folder Bar background styling is ignored in Thunderbird 68
  • [issue 16] Avoid showing current folder toolbar at bottom of screen in column view. Ideally it should be shown as vertical bar between thread pane and preview. For now, it shows on top of the preview pane.
  • Improved label color for Renewal button
  • Completed translations for Spanish, French, Polish, Brazilian, Russian and Swedish users. If you have any suggestions for improvements please contact support or join the official translators team on Babelzilla
Version 4.17.2 Maintenance Version
  • [Issue 13] Thunderbird 68 regression: Cannot modify From and To addresses using Advanced Tab Properties.
Version 4.17.1 Maintenance Version
  • [Issue 11] Thunderbird 60 regression: in 4.17 - No results are shown in quickJump / quickMove when typing in Thunderbird 60.9; this s a regression caused by moving the search panel to a separate xul file (necessary for compatibility with Thunderbird 70, where search boxes are replaced by an new XUL element).
  • [Issue 9] Thunderbird 68 regression: when the shortcuts combinations SHIFT+S, SHIFT+M, SHIFT+J are used in the quick filter search field, they are accidentally executed and do not enter as uppercase letters in the search box as expected. This is caused by some input types have changed in Thunderbird 68 following deprecation of XUL elements.
Version 4.17 Release
  • [Bug 26703] Added option to hide mail commands popup menu. If acive, the QuickFolders commands menuy will only be shown when CTRL is pressed while clicking the tab.
  • [issue 7] Fixed: font color in striped mode ignored on colored tabs
  • [Bug 26683] Advanced tab property - Option to set dragged / moved emails to UNREAD.
Thunderbird 68 specific Fixes
  • Fixed: number fields are displayed too wide and with unnecessary paddings which may lead to legibility issues after preferences.css had to he removed.
  • [issue 8] in Thunderbird 70, the label is removed on right-clicking a tab. Also, the quickJump and quickMove functions stopped working. I highly recommend using the current release version Thunderbird 68.* and not a beta version on your daily mail profile as there will be many breaking changes in the next months. If you want to use beta versions, make sure to use a test profile and regularly back up your mail to avoid data loss.
  • The filter template dialog isn't shown properly in Thunderbird 68 - generally I would recommend to install the quickFilters Add-on instead, as it has more advanced functions for managing and creating mail filters.

description.en-US:
Bookmark mail folders in Thunderbird. Fully compatible with Thunderbird 60 - 68!

This extension adds an extra toolbar to Thunderbird. When you drag a mail folder to it, you get a fully customizable shortcut to that mail folder. This supports full drag and drop, like the corresponding folder in the folder tree - You can drag messages on it to move/copy them to the folder, and access the bookmarked folders through keyboard shortcuts.

This is handy when you have a large tree of folders for clients or projects, but use only a few of them at the same time.

The quickMove / quickJump feature allows you to jump to any folder with a few keystrokes, including child folders using the "slash" feature. You can even create new folders while moving mail in order to expand an existing folder hierarchy.

The Category feature adds more usability by adding distinct areas to work in; this can make it easier to focus on a task that needs just a subset of the folders visible. There is also excellent integration with the Thunderbird tabbed interface provided since Tb version 3.
description.de: Bookmark Mail Ordner in Thunderbird. Vollständig kompatibel mit Thunderbird 60 - 68! Diese Erweiterung erzeugt eine neue Werkzeugleiste in Thunderbird. Wenn Sie darauf einen Mail Ordner ziehen, erhalten Sie eine Verknüpfung auf diesen Ordner. Sie können damit auch Mails per drag & drop verschieben / kopieren. Dies ist praktisch wenn man eine große Verzeichnisstruktur mit vielen Ordnern hat (z.B. für Kunden, Projekte) aber normalerweise nur mit einer kleineren Auswahl davon arbeitet. Mit der Funktion quickMove / quickJump können Sie mit wenigen Tastenanschlägen zu einem beliebigen Ordner springen, einschließlich untergeordneter Ordner - mit Hilfe des "Schräger (/)" Shortcut. Sie können sogar neue Ordner erstellen, während Sie E-Mails verschieben, um eine vorhandene Ordnerhierarchie zu erweitern. Durch die neuen Kategorien lässt sich die Arbeit mit Mails noch einfacher strukturieren. Damit lassen sich die wichtigsten Ordner einer Kategorie (z.B. Arbeit / Hobby etc.) darstellen - spezielle Ordner wie z.B. Posteingang können permanent angezeigt werden. Eine genauere Beschreibung der Features können Sie auf http://quickfolders.mozdev.org ansehen. Kompatibel mit Thunderbird 3.0 (beta2)

developer_comments.en-US: Milestones Find the complete history + bug list, visit quickfolders.org/version.html Thanks!! Axel
developer_comments.de: Was gibt's Neues und Gutes? Erstmal hab ich die Fehlerliste von hier entfernt um diese Seite lesbarer zu machen. Für die komplette Versionsgeschichte bitte nach quickfolders.mozdev.org/version.html gehen. Version 4.17.4 QuickFolders ist jetzt voll mit Thunderbird 68 kompatibel. Mehr Informationen und Tips zu QuickFolders gibt's hier: http://quickfolders.org/faq_tips.htm Zur Weiterentwicklung von QuickFolders können Sie eine Pro Lizenz mit zusätzlichen Funktionen kaufen... Vielen Dank, Axel

caption.en-US: Tabbed folders for Thunderbird. Productivity Enhancement for the Serious Emailer. Supports Thunderbird, Postbox and SeaMonkey
Right-click to open subfolders. See new mail counts at a glance.
Drag Emails into your favorite folders
caption.de: E-Mails schnell und einfach in ihre Lieblingsverzeichnisse verschieben.

caption.en-US: Drag Email into a sub folder via a tab
caption.de: Drag und drop: Emails in ein [Unter-]Verzeichnis verschieben =>

caption.en-US: Recent Folders - display the visited folders and the ones that mail was moved to
caption.de: Mit dem "Letzte Ordner" Tab kann man die zuletzt benutzten Verzeichnisse schnell und bequem ansprechen

caption.en-US: Current Folder Bar - additional Commands right above current the mail preview
Current Folder Bar
Recent folders button for quick access and to drag mails to
re-order the tabs by dragging them
Use Categories for showing just a sub set of tabs
Use the command menu for advanced feature, such as painting tabs
Color tabs individually with the palette
general options
advanced options
layout options (bling!) - icons - colors - mac-like themes - natural tabs. Choose from 2 palettes for coloring.
quick help - the full documentation website is just one click away...
support options: report bugs, request Features, contact the developer directly, translate QF into your language, version history, donations.
Different Styles and Colors: Flat style, Apple Pills, Native tabs, Native Buttons
multi-rows tabs
Personas Support: Translucent tabs and transparent toolbar
Start "Create Filter" mode
Filtering learning: just drag and drop emails, as usual leave the rest to the Wizard...
... tell the filter assistant about the email you filed away ...
...and it opens a brand new filter to customize, with matching conditions and filter action (move to folder ...)
better Theme Support - Integrates well, even with dark themes

summary.en-US:
The "Swiss army knife" of folders. Turn your favorites into tabs - open folders and subfolders, move mails without scrolling around or searching. powerful + easy.

See new mail at a glance after automatic filtering - supports quickFilters addon!
summary.de: Ordner Tabs - vereinfacht das Chaos im Verzeichnisbaum indem die wichtigsten Ordner zu Tabs gemacht werden. Verzeichnisse und Unterverzeichnisse öffnen, mails verschieben - alles ohne scrollen und suchen.  Jetzt auch mit Kategorien, zum Filtern!
summary.nl: Het ‘Zwitserse zakmes’ van mappen. Zet uw favorieten om naar tabbladen - open mappen en tabbladen, verplaats e-mails zonder scrollen of zoeken. Krachtig en eenvoudig.
